sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-table :data="tableData" style="width: 100%">
    <el-table-column type="expand" style="left: 20px">
      <template #default="props">
        <!-- <template > -->
        <el-table
          :data="props.row.children"
          style="width: 100%; margin-left: 40px"
        >
          <el-table-column prop="date" label="门店" width="180">
          </el-table-column>
          <el-table-column prop="name" label="门店类型" width="180">
          </el-table-column>
          <el-table-column prop="address" label="地址"> </el-table-column>
        </el-table>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="id"> </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="name"> </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="desc"> </el-table-column>
  </el-table>
</template>

<style lang='scss' scoped>
.demo-table-expand {
  font-size: 0;
}
.demo-table-expand label {
  width: 90px;
  color: #99a9bf;
}
.demo-table-expand .el-form-item {
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  width: 50%;
}
.el-table
  .el-table--fit
  .el-table--enable-row-hover
  .el-table--enable-row-transition {
  margin-left: 47px !important;
}
</style>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
        tbData:[],
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    get('/getAllDepartments').then((res) => {
      console.log(res)
      this.tbData = res.data
    })
  },
  methods: {
    handleSizeChange: function (size) {
      //一页显示多少条

      this.pagesize = size
    },

    handleCurrentChange: function (currentPage) {
      //页码更改方法

      this.currentPage = currentPage
    },
    handleClick(data) {
      this.info = data.row
      this.dialogVisible = !this.dialogVisible
    },
    del(data) {
      console.log(data.row.departmentId)
      get('/deleteDepartment', { departmentId: data.row.departmentId }).then(
        (res) => {
          ElMessage({
            message: '删除成功！',
            type: 'success'
          })
        }
      )
      window.location.reload() //刷新
    },
    edit() {
      this.dialogVisible = !this.dialogVisible //马上消失
      //作用是调整下createTime的格式
      var dt = new Date(this.info.createTime)
      let year = dt.getFullYear()
      let month = dt.getMonth() + 1
      let date = dt.getDate()
      this.info.createTime = year + '/' + month + '/' + date
      get('/updateDepartment', this.info).then((res) => {
        ElMessage({
          message: '修改成功！',
          type: 'success'
        })
        window.location.reload()
      })
    },
    add() {
      this.dialogVisible1 = !this.dialogVisible1
    },
    insert() {
      this.dialogVisible1 = !this.dialogVisible1
      get('/addDepartment', this.info1).then((res) => {
        console.log(res)
        if (res.data == 1) {
          ElMessage({
            message: '添加成功',
            type: 'success'
          })
          // 刷新
          window.location.reload()
        } else {
          ElMessage({
            message: '添加失败',
            type: 'danger'
          })
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>
